sentences.sentence: Rocket-propelled elytra flight is finally here!
sentences.translation: 火箭驱动的鞘翅飞行终于到来了！

sentences.sentence: When the mist arrives, O. unguicularis tilts its body forward into the wind, and moisture rolls down its fused elytra into its mouth.
sentences.translation: 当雾气来袭，沐雾甲虫会把身体前倾入风中，好让水气顺著黏合的翅鞘滚入口中。
